## A1. Books

### A1.a. Chemical Education Research Methods
- Bunce, D. M., & Cole, R. S. (Eds.). (2008). [Nuts and Bolts of Chemical Education Research](https://doi.org/10.1021/bk-2008-0976). American Chemical Society.

- Bunce, D. M., & Cole, R. C. (Eds.). (2014). [Tools of Chemistry Education Research](https://doi.org/10.1021/bk-2014-1166). American Chemical Society.

### A1.b. Organic Chemistry Education
- Graulich, N., & Shultz, G. (Eds.). (2023). [Student reasoning in organic chemistry: Research advances and evidence-based instructional practices](https://pubs.rsc.org/en/content/ebook/978-1-83916-491-0). Royal Society of Chemistry.

## A2. Journals

### A2.a. Chemical Education and Chemical Education Research
- [Journal of Chemical Education](https://pubs.acs.org/journal/jceda8). American Chemical Society.

- [Chemistry Education Research and Practice](https://www.rsc.org/journals-books-databases/about-journals/chemistry-education-research-practice). Royal Society of Chemistry.

### A2.b. STEM and Discipline-Based Education Research
- [Journal of Research in Science Teaching](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/10982736). National Association of Research in Science Teaching (NARST).
